definition: direct, winner-takes-all system of election in use for village committees/preselection for a competition
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Today, the American Idol Audition Road Show made its way to Louisville, Kentucky.
sentences.chinese: 今天，美偶的海選已經到了肯塔基州的路易斯維爾。

sentences.english: A few of us actually entertained the notion of auditioning for American Idol.
sentences.chinese: 我們中心有幾小我還考慮過加入美國偶像的海選。

sentences.english: This paper comes out of the field research on "sea election".
sentences.chinese: 本文對這一海選過程作了實證性的資料調查。

sentences.english: A few of us actually entertained the notion of auditioning for American Idol.
sentences.chinese: 我們中間有幾個人還考慮過參加美國偶像的海選。

sentences.english: He had barely survived the audition and finally got a chance to advance in the contest.
sentences.chinese: 海選中，他險遭淘汰，但最終贏得晉級的機會。

sentences.english: I think it's the most exciting audition I've ever seen in the show.
sentences.chinese: 這是我在節目中看過最精彩的海選。

sentences.english: He had barely survived the third audition and finally got a chance to advance in the contest.
sentences.chinese: 第三次海選時，他險遭淘汰，但最終贏得晉級的機會。

sentences.english: I have watched this first audition so many times and never get tired of it!
sentences.chinese: 這段海選視頻我看了很多次，但從來都看不夠。

definition: (sports) semifinal or quarterfinal/to compete in a semifinal (or a quarterfinal)
preliminary contest/initial heats of a competition
to call for entries and select the best/to solicit (entries, submissions, applications etc)/to select (the best candidate)/contest/competition
to compete/to take part in a competition
evaluation committee/judging panel/judging panel member/adjudicator/abbr. for 評選委員會委員|评选委员会委员[ping2 xuan3 wei3 yuan2 hui4 wei3 yuan2]
